title: Match With Excellent Roommates for this 3 bed 2 baths Apartment
map_address: Evergreen St near S Huntington Ave
posting_body: ['If you’re interested in being matched with compatible roommates to jointly find a place anywhere in Boston such as the one on this ad, read on.', 'PROCESS:', '1.', 'You: Enter your preferences, views and and expectations regarding sharing a living space.', 'I will send you a form once you reach out.', '2.', 'Me: Match you with others compatible with you.', '3.', 'You + Others: Decide if you are in fact compatible and want to live together.', '4.', 'Your group + Me: : Begin the home search as a group on any location in Boston.', 'Everyone is welcome to apply.', 'I have designed the process to be rigorous but neither lengthy nor difficult.', 'Investing the time now likely will result in finding more compatible roommates.', 'I’m a residential real estate agent and many of the listings in Boston unfortunately come with a tenant-paid broker fee.', 'It’s always negotiable but the current housing market may not favor that.', 'WHY FIND A PLACE THIS WAY?', '* Save time, effort and find a place with less frustration.', '* Tenant’s agent, different from landlord’s agent.', 'Tenant’s agent owes fiduciary duties to the tenant, representing their interests in the contract.', '* Choose who you live with.', 'If your interest remains, read on, send me a message referencing your favorite ice cream or city', 'so I know you have read the ad and are a serious inquiry.', 'LOCATION:', '* Evergreen St & S Huntington Ave', '* Close to:', '* Stop & Shop', '* Whole Foods', '* Restaurants & Cafes on Centre St', '* T Green E', '* T Orange line', '* Buses #39, #60 to Longwood Medical Area', 'LEASE:', '* 3 beds, 2 full baths', '* $3,000 per month.', 'Note that the group will decide how to allocate rent share.', '$1,000 is only a suggestion.', '* 1 year starting Aug 1st.', '* First Month, Last Month, Security Deposit (1 month) & Broker Fee (1 month)', '* Water, sewer included.', 'PLACE:', '* 3 beds, 2 full baths.', '* Available Sept 1st.', '* Completely unfurnished.', '* 1,450 SQFT on 2nd floor.', '* Building built in 2000.', '* Laundry in building.', '* Street parking (permit)', '* Nice kitchen with a pantry and a breakfast bar.', 'If you have any questions don’t hesitate to let me know.', 'Happy house hunting ;)', 'Mussa Kiroga', 'Stuart St James Residential Brokerage']
